column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The pastries - oh my.  I'm not a very sweet breakfast/pastry person
column2: so I haven't tried a lot
column3: but their croissants are heavenly. I've tried the regular
column5: and pistachio and you can't go wrong with any of them.  The crust is that perfect combo of flaky and chewy
column6: and the fillings are delightful and taste as if they are made from real ingredients.
